org.spongepowered.api.event.entity

Interface ExplosionPrimeEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cancellable, EntityEvent, Event, GameEvent

    public interface ExplosionPrimeEvent
extends EntityEvent, Cancellable
    Represents an event when an Explosive is about to explode.

    Explosions usually affect a radius and ignite, depending on the explosion.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getRadius()
      Gets the explosive radius that the Explosive will affect.
      boolean isFlammable()
      Gets whether the explosion will ignite ignitable blocks.
      void setFlammable(boolean flammable)
      Sets whether this explosion will be flammable or not.
      void setRadius(double radius)
      Sets the explosion radius.

    • Method Detail

      • getRadius

        double getRadius()
        Gets the explosive radius that the Explosive will affect.
        Returns:
        The radius of effect

      • setRadius

        void setRadius(double radius)
        Sets the explosion radius.
        Parameters:
        radius - The explosion radius

      • isFlammable

        boolean isFlammable()
        Gets whether the explosion will ignite ignitable blocks.

        Blocks that may be ignited include logs, leaves, wool, etc.

        Returns:
        Whether this explosion is flammable

      • setFlammable

        void setFlammable(boolean flammable)
        Sets whether this explosion will be flammable or not.

        Blocks that may be ignited include logs, leaves, wool, etc.

        Parameters:
        flammable - Whether this explosion is flammable
